comments.content: There must be a couple of thousand. No, really. :^/

It seems Avant Garde is omnipresent right now... But if we are talking “famous” uses of the typeface, FAC1 by Peter Saville is my personal favorite:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906155652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/7700a3dc1c11c0e61a11f7c49374eb9e49ec1dee_m_6493.jpg)
